author: Marlin Firmware
text: We now tout PlatformIO + Visual Studio Code as the preferred build environment for Marlin going forward. You can still use Arduino IDE for the platforms it supports, but VSCode puts more power in our hands. For example VSCode can host Electron apps, so a configurator is planned.
